254185.「これは これは……。\n あなたは かなりの剛の者と 見受けました。\n そこ:
Well, well, well... You seem to be a man of great strength... That's why you're here to talk to me. My name is Gabra, and I'm a
hexenbiest trainer... I'm a hexenbiest trainer named Gabra... and I run a training facility in a certain part of the world...
where I raise monsters called pygmy beasts. There is a dangerous creature that escaped from the training grounds due to our
incompetence... I'm afraid to say it myself. I'm afraid to say it myself, but this is a very powerful demon that I raised with all my
heart and soul... I'm sure you'll have a hard time... But there's something you can gain as well... When you defeat a pygmy beast, you
get a core of pyrotechnics that you can use to strengthen your equipment... For more information on the Nucleus, please ask the
nearby pyromancer Levy... He can also restore shards and fragments... Now, in order to find the pyroxene, I have something for you...
Please, accept...

254186.「さて……この魔獣調教士ガブラめに\n 本日は どのような ご用件でございますか:
Well... What can I do for you today, Gabula
the Hexenbiest?<break>

254187.「他に 何か ご用件は ありますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

254188.「かしこまりました。\n それでは また お越しください。\n<end>: Yes, sir. Then please come again.<end>

254189.「さて……。この魔獣調教士ガブラめに\n 本日は どのような ご用件でございます:
Well... What can I do for you today, Gabula
the Hexenbiest?<break>

254190.「<%sM_MONSTER>を 速成培養するのなら\n 魔因細胞を <%nM_I:
If you're going to accelerate the cultivation of <%sM_MONSTER>, you'll need <%dM_ITEM_NUM> Demon Cells.
The cells will be consumed regardless of whether you win or lose. Is that fine?

254191.「……おや？\n 魔因細胞が 足りないようです。\n お時間のあるときに 集めて:
...What's this? You don't have enough Demon
Cells. Why not try gathering some when you
get the chance?
<end>
English

254192.「申し訳ありませんが あなたは\n パーティのリーダーでは ございませんね。\n:
I'm sorry, sir, but you are not the leader of
this party. You've only been here since you
became the leader...<end>

254193.「この秘術をかければ 今から ３０分の間\n 魔界の魔物を倒したときに 魔因細胞:
By using this technique, monsters in the Demon World will start rarely dropping Demon Cells for the next 30 minutes.
I can only use this technique once per day. If you gain a different charm effect, it will overwrite this one, so be careful.
This technique won't work on your party members either; it only works on you. Be sure to remember that.
Are you absolutely sure you want me to use this technique, then?

254194.「では まいります……。\n ガ～ブラン ダ～ブラン セルルーチョっ！\n<br:
Here we go... Ga-bran, da-bran, serluccio! ... The spell will now take effect... The effects of the spell will wear off in 30
minutes, so please hurry...

254195.「私は 魔獣調教士のガブラと 申します。\n 魔界のとある場所で 調練場を開いて:
My name is Gavra, and I'm a hexenbiest trainer. I'm a hexenbiest trainer named Gabra... and I run a training facility in a
certain part of the demon world... where I raise monsters called pygmy beasts. There is a dangerous creature that escaped from the
training grounds due to our incompetence... I'm afraid to say it myself. I'm afraid to say it myself, but this is a very powerful
demon that I raised with all my heart and soul... I'm sure you'll have a hard time... But there's something you can gain as well...
When you defeat a pygmy beast, you get a core of pyrotechnics that you can use to strengthen your equipment... For more
information on the Nucleus, please ask the nearby pyromancer Levy... He can also restore shards and fragments... If you're looking for
a pygmy, you can use your crystal gauge to see if there's a chance of one appearing in the area you're in...

254258.<select_se_off>\n培養輝晶獣と戦う\n秘術をかける\n説明を聞く:
<select_se_off>
Fight Cultivated Crystalbeast

<select_end><case 1><close><case 2><break><case 3><break><case_cancel><break><case_end>

256703.「おやおや？ 本日は もう\n あなたに 秘術をかけた記憶がございます。\n １:
Well, well, well. I don't remember performing
the spell on you today... Only once a day,
so...<bw_break>

256917.「……おや。あなたは 冒険に出てから\n ２４時間 経過していないため\n この:
..... You can't cast this spell because you
haven't been on an adventure for 24 hours...<bw_break>

257313.「本当に 細胞回収器を使って\n <%sM_MONSTER>と 戦うということで:
Use the Cell Collector to fight
<%sM_MONSTER>?
<yesno 2><case 1><close><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

257314.「負けない自信が おありのようですね\n 本当に 細胞回収器を使わずに\n <%:
Are you really sure you're confident enough
to fight <%sM_MONSTER>
without using a Cell Collector?
<yesno 2><case 1><close><case 2><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

257781.<select_se_off>\nそのまま戦う\n細胞回収器を使って戦う\nやめ:
<select_se_off>
Fight As Is
Fight with Cell Collector
Cancel
<select_end><case 1><break><case 2><break><case 3><close><case_cancel><close><case_end>

257782.「細胞回収器を お持ちでないようですね。\n 近くにおります 輝晶術士レビィから:
It appears you don't have a Cell Collector.
You can get one from Levy nearby.
<end>

257783.「<%sM_MONSTER>を 速成培養するのなら\n 魔因細胞を <%nM_I:
If you're going to accelerate the cultivation of <%sM_MONSTER>, you'll need <%dM_ITEM_NUM> Demon Cells.
The cells will be consumed regardless of whether you win or lose. Is that fine?

257818.「それを使えば あなたが 今いる地域に\n 輝晶獣が 出現する可能性があるかどう:
You can use it to find out if there is a chance of a Kaiju appearing in the area you are in... And if you don't have time to look
for one, but you want to fight one, you can fight one that I've cultivated for you... But to do this, you'll need to prepare some
hexenbiest cells that can be obtained by defeating demons in the demon world with a special magic... One point! A word of
caution... I'm sure you've heard of it... If you're worried about losing, I'll have Levy prepare a cell retrieval device that can
recover and regenerate the magical cells... ... I know this is a bit of a digression, but I'm asking you to lend me your help.

257926.「また 探す時間はないが 輝晶獣と戦いたいと\n おっしゃる場合は 私が 速成培:
And if you don't have time to find one, but you want to fight a hexenbiest, you can fight a hexenbiest that I've cultivated for you...
But to do this, you'll need to prepare some hexenbiest cells that can be obtained by defeating a demon in the demon world while
under a special spell... One point! A word of caution... I'm sure you've heard of it... If you're worried about losing, Levy has a cell
retrieval device that can recover and regenerate the magical cells... ... I know this is a bit of a digression, but I'm asking
you to lend me your help.
